title: Aelita Queen of Mars (restored, colorized) (1924, Russia, sci-fi, adventure, imdb score: 6.5)

sources.title: Aelita Queen Of Mars Colorized Movie 720p
sources.description: Aelita (Russian: Аэли́та), also known as Aelita: Queen of Mars, is a 1924 Soviet silent science fiction film directed by Yakov Protazanov and produced at the Mezhrabpom-Rus film studio. It was based on Alexei Tolstoy's 1923 novel of the same name. Nikolai Tseretelli and Valentina Kuindzhi were cast in leading roles.
